label: Authentication
comment: A proof that something is genuine.

datatypeProperties.comment: The actual date, time, date time, or other date time value of this document authentication.
A code specifying a category for this document authentication.
The code specifying the type of document authentication.
A unique identifier for this document authentication.
Information, expressed as text, for this document authentication.
The code specifying the type of representation of this document authentication, such as direct or indirect.
The signatory, expressed as text, for this document authentication.
The signatory image, expressed as a binary object, for this document authentication.
The statement, expressed as text, for this document authentication.
The code specifying the statement for this document authentication.

objectProperties.comment: A document clause included in this document authentication.
The issue location for this document authentication.
The trade party providing the location for this document authentication.
The referenced party providing this document authentication.

referencedBy.comment: The approver signature that authenticates this exchanged document.
A document authentication asserted for this supply chain trade line item.
The buyer signature that authenticates this exchanged document.
The first or primary signature that authenticates this exchanged document.
The fourth signature, also known as the third counter signature, that has been authenticated on this exchanged document indicating where appropriate the authentication party.
The authentication of the results of this applied chemical treatment.
The second signature, also known as the first counter signature, that has been authenticated on this exchanged document indicating where appropriate the authentication party.
The third signature, also known as the second counter signature, that has been authenticated on this exchanged document indicating where appropriate the authentication party.
